title: Luxury Natura Bisse skin care range launched at Jumeirah Zabeel Saray - Travelandtourworld.comTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Luxury Natura Bisse skin care range launched at Jumeirah Zabeel Saray
Jumeirah Zabeel Saray, the Ottoman inspired resort located on Palm Jumeirah, has launched a new treatment menu and product line at its award-winning Talise Ottoman Spa.
The high-end, luxury skin care company Natura Bissé has been tailored exclusively for the Talise Ottoman Spa. The world renowned Spanish skincare line has designed seven exciting new treatments that will feature on the Talise Ottoman Spa’s treatment menu, available from October 2015.
Fernando Gibaja, Resort General Manager, said: “We are excited to launch our new treatment menu and products with Natura Bissé at our award winning Talise Ottoman Spa. The new treatments and experiences support our Jumeirah STAY DIFFERENT™ brand promise while further enhancing the guest experience.”
A perfect fit for the largest and most luxurious spa in the Middle East, a Natura Bissé retail product line will be available to purchase from the spa’s very own Talise Boutique in addition to specialised luxury treatments on offer including ‘The Life Infusion Ritual’ and ‘O2 Body Perfection.’ Treatments featuring Natura Bissé start from AED 665 and retail products are priced from AED 400.
Used by celebrities on the lead up to Hollywood red-carpet events, Natura Bissé will complement the spa’s current portfolio of luxury products already available, including Shiffa and Margy’s Monte Carlo.
Source: Jumeirah.
